repairedDockerfile:
# Simple Dockerfile for testing docker cloud repository 
FROM ubuntu:16.04 
MAINTAINER centrifugal4@gmail.com 

RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y \--no-install-recommends \
build-essential python3-dev python3-pip python3-setuptools && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
